name: High Templar of Dust
resistance: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
conimmunities: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, unconscious

traits.name: Sandstorm
traits.desc: At the start of each of the Templar’s turns, each creature within 5 feet of it takes 5 (1d10) piercing damage.

traits.name: Scour (Recharge 5–6)
traits.desc: The Templar moves up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks. It can move through creatures, and each creature it passes through must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or take 10 (3d6) force damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The Templar makes four attacks with its halberd, Lightning, or Fire. Lightning and Fire can only be used twice each.

actions.name: Halberd
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) slashing damage.

actions.name: Lightning
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +7 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (3d6) lightning damage.

actions.name: Fire
actions.desc: The Templar hurls a ball of fire that explodes at a point it can see within 60 feet. Each creature within a sphere of 10-foot radius centered on that point must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw. The sphere spreads around corners. On a failed save, a creature takes 10 (3d6) fire damage, or half as much damage on a successful one.
